DOC.detailed_description: TAXUS ATLAS Small Vessel global , multi-center , single-arm , trial patient receive TAXUS Liberté-SR 2.25 mm paclitaxel-eluting stent . The result compare two different historical control group . The first control group consist subset lesion-matched TAXUS V patient treat 2.25 mm TAXUS Express-SR paclitaxel-eluting stent . The objective analysis evaluate clinical angiographic outcome TAXUS Liberté-SR 2.25 mm stent de novo lesion versus TAXUS Express-SR stent . The hypothesis TAXUS Liberté-SR stent non-inferior safety efficacy TAXUS Express-SR stent treatment de novo lesion small coronary vessel . The second control group consist subset lesion-matched TAXUS V patient treat either 2.5 mm 2.25 mm bare metal Express stent . The objective analysis evaluate clinical angiographic outcome TAXUS Liberté-SR 2.25 mm stent de novo lesion versus Express bare metal stent . The hypothesis TAXUS Liberté-SR stent superior safety efficacy Express bare metal stent treatment de novo lesion small coronary vessel .
